definition: medicine/drug/substance used for a specific purpose (e.g. poisoning, explosion, fermenting)/CL:種|种[zhong3],服[fu4],味[wei4]/to poison

sentences.english: Be careful not to let any of the leaves go into the cup.
sentences.chinese: 倒出時要當心不要把藥渣倒入杯中。

sentences.english: Be careful no to let any of the leaves go into the cup.
sentences.chinese: 倒出時當心不要把藥渣倒入杯中。
